mapper.sql: id, code, name, is_lease, sbtype_one, sbtype_two, sbtype_three, sbmodel_code, tech_code, factory, prod_date, prod_code, ma_code, ma_start_date, ma_end_date, proof, proof_code, license, arrive_date, use_date, comp, contranct, buy_price, is_new, ware, is_rfid, asset_code, status, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version, position_code, state_code, cost_years, day_lease_fee, main_para, para1, para2, para3, para4, para5, para6, para7, para8
mapper.select: select t.*,t1.name as sbtype_one_name,t2.name as sbtype_two_name,t3.name as sbtype_three_name,t4.name as sbmodel_name from sb_equipment_t t left join sb_type t1 on t.sbtype_one=t1.code and t1.status='1' left join sb_type t2 on t.sbtype_two=t2.code and t2.status='1' left join sb_type t3 on t.sbtype_three=t3.code and t3.status='1' left join sb_model t4 on t.sbmodel_code=t4.code and t4.status='1' where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete:
update sb_equipment_t set status = 99 where id in
